arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic ace facing possible season KO - 'I'm gutted for the boy...'
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney admits he is 'gutted' for Tyrese Francois, with fears the Wigan Athletic midfielder could even miss the rest of the season with ankle ligament damage.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic chief running out of superlatives for Sam Tickle - 'He's that good...he always produces for us...'
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney admitted he's running out of plaudits to describe Sam Tickle after the young goalkeeper got Wigan Athletic out of jail against Northampton Town.

arts.ttl: Goalkeeper Sam Tickle in stunning form to help Wigan beat Northampton
arts.sum: Stopper made several fine saves against the Cobblers.

arts.ttl: REPORT: Wigan Athletic 2 Northampton Town 1 - Tickle heroics see Latics over the line
arts.sum: Sam Tickle produced a stunning second-half goalkeeping masterclass to ensure Wigan Athletic didnâ€™t throw away three points their first-half display undoubtedly merited.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: Three changes in our expected team v Northampton Town
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic squad and predicts the 11 men who Shaun Maloney will select to start against Northampton Town at the Brick Community Stadium.

arts.ttl: Why 'genius' manager is the right man to lead the rebuild, by Wigan Athletic old-boy
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic's deserved victory at Barnsley at the weekend came as no surprise to at least one member of the opposition.

arts.ttl: Shaun Maloney pinpoints 'defining aspect' of Wigan Athletic's season
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney insists Wigan Athletic have to maintain their performance levels against Northampton Town on Tuesday - or risk undoing much of their good work at Barnsley.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic boss muses injury blow - 'It doesn't look amazing'
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic are waiting to discover whether the gloss has been taken off Saturday's victory at Barnsley by the loss of Tyrese Francois.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic ace comes back fighting after 'what he's gone through'
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney has challenged Baba Adeeko to use his 'stand-out' performance at Barnsley as proof he can regain his regular starting spot in the Wigan Athletic midfield.

arts.ttl: Preview: Wigan Athletic vs. Northampton Town - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Tuesday's League One clash between Wigan Athletic and Northampton Town, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
